summary: Results-oriented Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) with expertise in automation frameworks, manual testing, and full-stack development. Experienced in Selenium, Playwright, RestAssured, JMeter, Appium, TestNG, BDD Cucumber, and CI/CD pipelines.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET)
responsibilities: Designed automation frameworks for Salesforce using Selenium, TestNG, and BDD Cucumber, reducing testing cycle time by 40%.
Authored 1,550+ test cases and identified 125+ critical bugs.
Developed API automation using RestAssured, ensuring 99.9% uptime.
Led performance testing using JMeter and K6.
Built an in-house reporting tool using the MERN stack.
Integrated CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions.

experience.title: SDET Intern
responsibilities: Developed test frameworks using Selenium, Appium, BDD Cucumber, and TestNG.
Collaborated with senior SDETs to improve application stability by 35%.
Documented test cases and bug reports using JIRA and Qmetry.

experience.title: Software Development Engineer (SDE) Intern
responsibilities: Developed a social media application using Python, Django, JavaScript, and MongoDB.
Implemented RESTful APIs and optimized database schemas.
Reduced application errors by 25% through debugging and unit testing.

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science

projects.title: Salesforce Automation Framework
projects.description: Developed a robust automation framework for Salesforce applications, reducing testing cycle time by 40%.
projects.impact: Improved test coverage by 60% and enhanced testing accuracy.

projects.title: API Automation Framework
projects.description: Built a scalable API automation framework to validate RESTful services.
projects.impact: Ensured 99.9% API reliability and minimized regression defects by 50%.

projects.title: Cross-Functional Integration Testing Platform
projects.description: Conducted end-to-end testing for Salesforce integration with ZOHO, ERP, and CCP systems.
projects.impact: Improved system interoperability and reduced integration bugs by 45%.

projects.title: Social Media Application
projects.description: Developed a scalable social media platform with user authentication, posts, comments, and real-time notifications.
projects.impact: Delivered a fully functional prototype within 8 weeks, achieving 95% user satisfaction.

certifications.title: Full Stack Web Development with MERN

achievements: Represented Maharashtra state at national-level sports championships, winning gold medals in two consecutive years (2021–2022).
Solved over 700 coding problems on platforms like LeetCode, GeeksforGeeks, CodeChef, and Codeforces, ranking in the top 5% on LeetCode.
Received the 'Best Intern Award' at MountBlue Technologies for outstanding performance in testing and development (2024).
Published a research paper on 'Optimizing Test Automation Frameworks for Cloud-Based Applications' in the International Journal of Software Engineering (2024).

extra_curricular.impact: Organized hackathons and coding bootcamps for 500+ students.
Conducted STEM workshops for 200+ students in rural India.
Documented tech meetups and cultural experiences, gaining over 10,000 subscribers.
